description: Mary seated at center, wearing dark blue cloak lined with gold, white headscarf and red dress, seated on a white throne, holding blonde baby Jesus, who rests his head in his hands and wears a yellow tunic; saints, from left to right:  balding old man with short grey beard, wearing a white robe with a dark blue cloak, holding a lily and a book with a red cover; man with white beard wearing white gloves with a red spot (stigmata?) on his PR hand, wearing pink robe and rich red brocade coat with blue and gold trim, and bishop's hat, holding a gold crosier; man wearing brown robe with rope belt, with stigmata on his hands and feet, holding a gold cross; man wearing gold crown, blue robe, orange stockings and pink cloak with yellow trim, holding a reed pen and a black baton (?); each figure has floral gold punchwork halo; intricate detail in foliage behind figures and at their feet
medium: Tempera, oil and gold leaf on panel
title: Virgin and Child Enthroned with Saints Dominic, Zenobius, Francis of Assisi and Minias
